Info.Title: Tazza: The Hidden Card
Info.Writer: Hyeong-Cheol Kang (screenplay), Sang-bum Cho (screenplay), Ji-Gang Lee (screenplay), Byeong-heon Lee (adaptation), Yeong-man Heo (graphic novels), Se-Young Kim (graphic novels)
Info.Actors: Seung-Hyun Choi, Se-Kyung Shin, Yoon-seok Kim, Hae-jin Yoo
Info.Plot: Go-ni's nephew, Ham Dae-gil, enters the gambling underworld only to be used as a scapegoat in a deal gone wrong. Now he's planning his revenge by entering one big fatal game.
